summary: The InnVestAI All Team Meeting focused on the USALI framework and its implications for the lodging industry. Team members discussed the importance of understanding the standards set by USALI for better financial reporting and operational efficiency. The meeting emphasized the need for further training and resources to ensure all team members are aligned with these standards.
decisions: Adopt USALI standards for financial reporting.
Schedule training sessions on USALI for all team members.

items.title: Organize USALI training sessions
items.details: Coordinate with a USALI expert to conduct training for all team members. Acceptance criteria include at least 80% attendance and a feedback score of 4 out of 5 or higher.

items.title: Distribute USALI resources
items.details: Compile and share relevant USALI documentation and resources with the team to aid in understanding and implementation.
